nodes.text: An Idiot's Array was a winning hand in the card game sabacc. The hand was used by Lando Calrissian to beat Garazeb Orrelios in a sabacc game. The Idiot's array comprised of the cards 2, 3, and the Idiot. The combination beat the pure sabacc of positive 23 that Orrelios had. Peli Motto once won over 500 credits off of Doctor Mandible when she had the hand.
